xal.extension.widgets.plot

Class SmartFormatGridLimits

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.widgets.plot.GridLimits
      • xal.extension.widgets.plot.SmartFormatGridLimits
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartGridLimits

    public class SmartFormatGridLimits
extends GridLimits
    This is subclass of grid limits class (GridLimits) with non-empty setSmartLimitsX() and setSmartLimitsY() methods. These methods will redefine format to beautify the axises markers
